1.name: Cleanse
1.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.

3.name: Exhaust
3.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Move Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 40% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Flash
4.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

6.name: Ghost
6.description: For 10 seconds, your champion can move through units and gains 24 - 48% Move Speed (depending on champion level). Ghost extends its duration on takedown.

7.name: Heal
7.description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Move Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

11.name: Smite
11.description: Deals 450 true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or minion. Holds two charges (90s Recharge Time)

12.name: Teleport
12.description: After channeling for 4 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure. Upgrades to Unleashed Teleport at 14 minutes, which teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.

13.name: Clarity
13.description: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.

14.name: Ignite
14.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

21.name: Barrier
21.description: Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.

30.name: To the King!
30.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.

31.name: Poro Toss
31.description: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.

32.name: Mark
32.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

39.name: Mark
39.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

54.name: Placeholder
54.description: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate selected at the start of the game. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!

55.name: Placeholder and Attack-Smite
55.description: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate and you will gain Attack-Smite. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!
